job.title: System Engineer
job.description: <p>Job Title: <strong><u>System Engineer (Office 365, Powershell Scripting &amp; Active Directory)</u></strong></p><p>Location: San Jose, CA or PST/West Coast</p><p>Duration: 6 Months</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Duties:</strong></p><p>1. User Support and Development</p><p>- Two parts: Scripting automations and answering user ticket</p><p>2. Tickets can range from automation requests to assisting with O365 access.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Experience:</strong></p><p>1. O365</p><p>2. Powershell Scripting</p><p>3. Active Directory</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Nice to Have:</strong></p><ol><li>OKTA</li><li>Google Workspace</li><li>Microsoft Technologies</li><li>Working in Active Directory</li></ol><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Tools and Programs:</strong></p><ol><li>O365 – Suite of Microsoft applications – Outlook, Excel, Word, etc.</li><li>PowerShell Language for automation – Scripting</li><li>Active Directory Experience&nbsp;.</li></ol><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;<em>If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume&nbsp;at </em>anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com<em>&nbsp;or call me at&nbsp;</em>(925) 218-2347<em>. Looking forward to hearing from you!</em></p>
